author: Imbio, LLC

ins_thresh.description: Threshold in Hounsfield Units (HU). Value must be between -1024 and -500 HU

description: The LDA Inspiration Assessment Gear provides a full 3D DICOM series with density overlays for detailed interpretation and a quantitative report of density categories by lung region. Lung categories are determined by a user selected threshold, given in HU.

inspiration.description: DICOM series of a full inspiration scan

label: LDA Inspiration Assessment (v2.4.3)
name: lda-insp
